title: Ice Cream Dreams
description:
Dr. Maya Warren has the sweetest job in the world. Traveling the globe, with only one thing on her mind. And it's probably not what you think.

Follow Dr. Maya on Instagram and Twitter

Discover Dr. Maya’s no-churn ice cream recipes on her website

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Vizzy — Try all four flavors https://www.vizzyhardseltzer.com/

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
